dcterms:creator: I. Armeni
O. Sener
A. R. Zamir
H. Jiang
I. Brilakis
M. Fischer
S. Savarese
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 3D scans from Matterport scanners in 6 areas including 271 rooms with a total of 6020 square meters. It has been fully annotated for 12 semantic classes which are structural elements and commonly found items and furniture.
dcterms:title: Stanford 3D semantic parsing data set

dcterms:creator: S. Song
F. Yu
A. Zeng
A. X. Chang
M. Savva
T. Funkhouser
dcterms:description: The SUNCG dataset contains 45,622 house models, 2,549 object files with corresponding material files and many texture files. It has been annotated for 84 classes and converted into 3D point clouds.
dcterms:title: SUNCG dataset
